import React from "react"; import { Button } from "../Button/Button"; import "./current-item.css"; export const CurrentItem = ({ currentItem, handleClick, getTop }) => { return (

Название: {currentItem.title}

Цена: {currentItem.price}р

{currentItem.sostav}
